title: Old Faithful Eruptions
text:
Waiting time between eruptions and the duration of the eruption for the Old Faithful geyser in Yellowstone National Park, Wyoming, USA.

selectInput(
  "n_breaks", label = "Number of bins:",
  choices = c(10, 20, 35, 50), selected = 20
)


Number of bins:

10
20
35
50




sliderInput(
  "bw_adjust", label = "Bandwidth adjustment:",
  min = 0.2, max = 2, value = 1, step = 0.2
)


Bandwidth adjustment:

title: Old Faithful Eruptions
text:
Waiting time between eruptions and the duration of the eruption for the Old Faithful geyser in Yellowstone National Park, Wyoming, USA.

  "n_breaks", label = "Number of bins:",
  choices = c(10, 20, 35, 50), selected = 20

35
50

title: Old Faithful Eruptions
text:
Column

Geyser Eruption Duration

renderPlot({
  erpt = faithful$eruptions
  hist(
    erpt, probability = TRUE, breaks = as.integer(input$n_breaks),
    xlab = "Duration (minutes)", main = "Geyser Eruption Duration",
    col = 'gray', border = 'white'
  )
  
  dens = density(erpt, adjust = input$bw_adjust)
  lines(dens, col = "blue", lwd = 2)
})

title: Отчеты
text: МастерСлух

title: МастерСлух
text:
data_account <- yadirGetReport(ReportType        = "CUSTOM_REPORT",
                               DateRangeType     = "CUSTOM_DATE",
                               DateFrom          = "2023-06-01",
                               DateTo            = Sys.Date() - 1,
                               FieldNames        = c("Date",
                                                     "CampaignName",
                                                     "Impressions",
                                                     "WeightedImpressions",
                                                     "Clicks",
                                                     "Sessions",
                                                     "Bounces",
                                                     "Cost",
                                                     "Conversions"),
                               Goals             = c(301649121,
                                                     301314275,
                                                     301313194,
                                                     301315472),
                               AttributionModels = c("FCCD", "AUTO"),
                               IncludeVAT        = "NO",
                               IncludeDiscount   = "NO",
                               AgencyAccount     = "platzkart.ru-e2",
                               Login             = "e-17332282",
                               TokenPath         = "direct_token")

Load token from direct_token/platzkart.ru-e2.yadirAuth.RData


Token expire in 334 days


-----------------------------------------------------------


Loading data by e-17332282


The report has been successfully queued for offline generation.


Proccesing|==|
Report successfully generated and transmitted in response body.
Server time: 12 sec.
Parsing time: 0 sec.
RequestID: 5155038441372434097
Total time: 12 sec.
100% server time rate.
0% parsing time rate.
Number of rows is 149
RequestID: 5155038441372434097
-----------------------------------------------------------



# подготовим данные к анализу
## задаем вектор имен
mc_names <- c("Calls_F", 
              "Calls_A", 
              "B24_F", 
              "B24_A", 
              "Forms_F", 
              "Forms_A", 
              "EMails_F", 
              "EMails_A")

## обработаем данные по целям
df1_mc <- data_account %>%
  select(9:ncol(.)) %>%
  mutate(across(where(is.character), ~as.numeric(str_replace(., "--", "0")))) %>%
  rename_at(vars(Conversions_301649121_FCCD:Conversions_301315472_AUTO), ~mc_names) %>%
  transmute(Goals_F = rowSums(across(ends_with("_F"), ~abs(.x))),
            Goals_A = rowSums(across(ends_with("_A"), ~abs(.x))))

## preparing the second data set
df2_mc <- data_account %>%
  select(1:8)

## combining data sets
account <- tibble(cbind(df2_mc, df1_mc))


Таблица: Метрики по всему аккаунту


account %>% 
  reframe(across(where(is.numeric), sum)) %>% 
  relocate(Cost) %>% 
  arrange(desc(Cost)) %>% 
  kbl(caption = "Метрики по всему аккаунту") %>% 
  kable_paper(lightable_options = c("bordered", "striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive"))

  reframe(across(where(is.numeric), sum), .by = CampaignName) %>%
  relocate(Cost,.after = CampaignName) %>% 
  arrange(desc(Cost)) %>% 
  kbl() %>% 
  kable_paper(lightable_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive"))

SITELINK1, SITELINK2, …, SITELINK8 — быстрые ссылки
VCARD — визитка
CHAT — чат с оператором
PHONE — номер телефона
MOBILE_APP_ICON — иконка приложения (для рекламы мобильных приложений)
BUTTON — кнопка загрузки/установки (для рекламы мобильных приложений)
PRODUCT_EXTENSIONS — товарные дополнения
MARKET — Маркет







Примечание



Для графических объявлений, смарт-баннеров, медийных баннеров и баннеров на поиске любой клик по объявлению считается кликом по заголовку.
